docs.title: Economy Engine
docs.text:
Free-tier sustainability through smart resource management.

Economy Engine implements the Gas Tank model — a credit-based system that ensures platform operations never exceed budget.

docs.title: The Economic Prime Directive
docs.text: No standing monthly costs. The platform MUST run on free tier.

docs.title: Components
docs.text: Component Purpose Gas Tank Credit balance tracking Ledger Double-entry transaction log Meter Usage metering

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Economy-Engine.git

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
from economy_engine import GasTank

tank = GasTank()
tank.consume(10, "dice_roll")
print(f"Balance: {tank.balance}")

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: The Gas Tank tracks credit balance with hard limits.

docs.title: Rules
docs.text:
1. No Debt — Operations fail when balance is 0
  2. Daily Refill — Credits reset daily
  3. Soft Warnings — Alerts at 20% remaining

docs.title: API
docs.text:
class GasTank:
    balance: int

    def consume(self, credits: int, operation: str) -> bool
    def refill(self, credits: int) -> None
    def check_available(self, credits: int) -> bool

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Economy-Engine.git

docs.title: Basic Usage
docs.text:
from economy_engine import GasTank, Ledger

# Check balance
tank = GasTank()
print(tank.balance)

# Record usage
tank.consume(credits=10, operation="api_call")

# View history
ledger = Ledger()
for entry in ledger.recent(10):
    print(entry)

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: Double-entry transaction log for all economic activity.

docs.title: Entry Format
docs.text:
class LedgerEntry:
    timestamp: datetime
    operation: str
    debit: int
    credit: int
    balance: int

docs.title: Querying
docs.text:
ledger = Ledger()
entries = ledger.query(
    start=datetime.now() - timedelta(days=7),
    operation="api_call"
)
